channel.title: Asterix
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]Asterix[/size]
After my last project has died down a bit, i decided to close up shop and work on a new project, being asterix.
My Aim with this Development is [b]NOT[/b] to make an RS/Era Remake but bring back things that players liked in old RuneScape like Quests, NPCs, Places, Minigames while adding my own twist to them all. If you think this is a RS Remake, Leave now
So, I started developing this yesterday. Its not something to fill in time but more to take my mind off the earthquakes and everything going on at the moment
-Recent Developments- [code]4/3/11 - Removed All Quests 4/3/11 - Removed all Dialogues, added 25 new dialogues (15 being player) 4/3/11 - Lumbridge Doors 99% 5/3/11 - General Stores in Lumby, Varrock, Fally, Ardy and Al-Kharid 5/3/11 - Aubury Teleports to essence 5/3/11 - Portals Teleport out of Essence Area 5/3/11 - Skill Interfaces 5/3/11 - Museum Curator Varrock Pickpocket and Conversation 5/3/11 - Talking ot hans added[/code]
-Media-
Rune Essence teleporting [img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/cdc1ea5d25.jpg[/img]
Random Men Conversations (Talk Option) [img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/fbe53649e3.jpg[/img]
Doors in Lumbridge & Gates work [img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/5987371a6e.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/437406245.jpg[/img]
Talking to hans :P [img]http://www.freeimagehosting.com/uploads/53743ceca5.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.freeimagehosting.com/uploads/1390af36b2.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.freeimagehosting.com/uploads/c23032451a.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.freeimagehosting.com/uploads/3a35ba29af.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.freeimagehosting.com/uploads/947a993be7.jpg[/img]
Proper Levelup Interface [img]http://www.freeimagehosting.com/uploads/7d98fafe80.jpg[/img] [hr]
So, Thanks for viewing my development. If you have any suggestions please let me know, if you are here to flame i think the logout button would be your only friend there ;)

item.title: Asterix
item.dc:creator: @Zhawa Zhawa
item.description:
@Zhawa wrote:

Thanks everybody for the support. I try to do as much as i can each day that i have off school. I dont have school for another week until the state of emergency is lifted so i can work on it quite a bit.

@Rash Yes the base is Delta

@Ix Soulcist xI Well the first thing i downloaded rs-ps related after the earthquake was Galkons Refactored client. My internet is capped now so i guess i gotta go with it

Few updates:

Cooks Assistant Quest
85 Dialogues now, 10 for cooks assistant and 25 for Lumbridge along
South Fally farm has Chickens, Cows and the rooster on the crate along with all doors working properly
Element Wizards are wandering around above Port Sarim. Going to work on Magnus or whatever his name is changing the mushroom into a skeleton

Shops close enough to RS:
Auburys Rune Exchange
Flynns Mace Market
Grums Gold Exchange
Thessalia’s Fine Clothes
Zaff’s Superior Staves
Lowes Archery Emporium
Horviks Armour Shop

Museum curator conversations. 4 to choose
Started Thieving base,

Read full topic

item.title: Asterix
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Something is wrong with few of the images. Good luck with the development though, I think this could go somewhere if continuing to develop it.

I love the cache being loading, and the graphics as well. I have no complaints nor feedback in order to make this a bit better. I can tell that you’ve added minor updates at the moment, so I can’t wait to see the rest.

Read full topic
